page.title: 05PARISH PUMP MAGAZINE part 1
page.content: Originally there were two publications in Debden,one puplished by the{Parish Council}and one by the {Church Council.}In{April 1979}they both amalgamated to form what is now called the{Parish Pump.}The Parish Pump got its name from the pump in the centre of the village, this was where people used to go to collect their water and while they were there they talked with other villagers and exchanged news. It therefore seemed natural to call the village magazine the Parish Pump. The editor of the Parish Pump is{Mr. A McLean,}he has been editor since 1982. The most important thing about the magazine is that it keeps people in touch with village events,activities,functions, and church services etc.The most popular part of the magazine seems to be the{letters page}....(cont pg.6)
